Title: The first bridge over the ten thousand 'li' long Yangzi
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Festive parade on the bridge over the Yangzi river in Wuhan. The train is carrying a Mao portrait in front. The slogan right above it is about May 1, International Labor Day. A 'li' is approximately half a kilometer.Designer Zhang Yuqing would later make a similar poster featuring the Yangzi River Bridge in Nanjing.The locomotive carrying a Mao portrait.In the parade, key industrial and agricultural products are shown off: coal, steel, grain, and cotton.This is a print from the ninth edition (July 1963).
Theme: The Yangzi River Bridge in Wuhan
